forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. South wind 14 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. South southwest wind 9 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the city is enveloped in a blanket of rain and cloud, with the persistent sound of droplets tapping against rooftops. The air is thick with moisture, the promise of warmer veins hidden beneath the chill, while a brisk south wind stirs the streets at 14 to 20 mph, making the coolness feel sharper. Raindrops form rivulets along windows, creating a tapestry of movement against the backdrop of an already shadowed sky. Visibility is sadly compromised, with fog lurking close to the hills and softening the outlines of the iconic Golden Gate. It’s that kind of day when you can feel the ocean’s embrace—the very essence of the marine layer wrapping itself around the city, blurring the edges of reality.

As night approaches, expect little relief, with temperatures hovering around 49 and the dampness persisting. A cozy jacket, perhaps a waterproof layer and sturdy shoes that can handle the slush underfoot, will be essential if you venture outside. This is not a day for grand adventures but rather a perfect occasion to find solace indoors—maybe explore the quiet allure of a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles delightfully with the sound of rain tapping gently against the window. Or lose yourself in the pages of a good book, nestled under a blanket while the world outside transforms into a watercolor of grey hues. Today offers a moment to pause, reflect, and find peace amid the storm.
